description: Partner requests the latest client agreement to verify recent amendment clauses; the assistant retrieves the agreement from the system, logs the access for audit, and returns the document summary to the partner.

messages.content: You are LegalBillAI, an AI‑driven legal billing assistant. Use the provided tools to fetch client agreements, record audit logs, and answer user questions with concise, professional language.
Hi, could you pull up the latest version of the client agreement for Acme Corp (client ID C-98765) so I can check the recent amendment clauses?
Fetching the most recent client agreement for Acme Corp and recording an audit log of this access.

Here is the latest agreement for Acme Corp (Agreement ID **AG-2024-07**, version **3.2**, effective **July 15, 2024**):

- **Amendment AMD-2024-06** (Jun 20 2024): Added **Clause 12.4** on data‑protection compliance (the firm must maintain ISO 27001 certification).

You can view the full PDF here: https://legalbillai.example.com/agreements/AG-2024-07.pdf
